attributes.action: Immediately deport and ban any asylum seeker found trying to enter the UK illegally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If they have a genuine reason, let them apply legally. The moment they try to enter illegally they are showing a blatant disregard for our laws. Therefore, if ANY asylum seeker is found attempting to enter illegally, they should be Immediately banned from EVER staying legally. Surely this would discourage illegal entry?
